articles.author: Lizette Chapman
articles.title: Palantir Reports Record Quarterly Revenue, Hikes Forecasts (PLTR) - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. raised its annual revenue outlook to $4.4 billion and outpaced analyst estimates for third-quarter sales, though the shares declined in after-hours trading on concerns about the company’s lofty valuation after a record run-up.

articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.title: Logitech’s latest keyboard dabbles in enthusiast features - The Verge
articles.description: Hands-on with Logitech’s Alto Keys K98M mechanical keyboard, which brings enthusiast features, a pleasant typing sound, and some sharp looks to the masses.
